question.questionText: Why does the tree shown in the picture have a shadow?

referenceAnswers.referenceAnswer: The tree blocks the light from the Sun.

studentAnswers.studentAnswer: If it show on south east the shadow will be facing north east.
In the early afternoon it would look point, north east.
The tree has a shadow because the tree blocked the sun from hitting the ground.
There is a shadow there because the sun is behind it and light cannot go through solid objects. Note, I think that question was kind of dumb.
Because the sun is over it.
Because the tree is of front.
Because the sun hits the tree with light and part of the tree is breaking it creates a shadow.
Because everything has a shadow and because of the sun.
The sun goes over us and we go around.
So it could look like a shadow to us.
Because the sun is hitting the tree and it is making a shadow.
Because the sun is up.
The object of the shadow is blocking light so there would be a shadow.
Because the sun is hitting at an object, and making a shadow.
The tree is blocking the sun rays.
Because the sun is on the east part and the trees block the sun.
Because it is an object and it covers part of the sun's brightness.
Because when an opaque object stands in the way of light the shadow is what replaces the light that should have been there.
Because the tree is in the sun's way so it will cast off a shadow.
Because it either has the light on it or some kind of light on it.
The tree in this picture has a shadow because the tree is something that can be reflected to the ground by the sun, and in this picture, the sun is out.
It has a shadow because the sun is facing one part of the tree and the dark part of the tree becomes a shadow.
The tree in the picture below has a shadow because the light hits the object and why there a shadow is because the light is being blocked off from front on back of the object.
Because the sun is going on it and it is blocking the light.
Because when a substance of an object blocks light, it creates a shadow.
Because the tree is blocking the sunshine.
Because the tree is an object that is blocking the light.
Because it blocks the light source that is trying to get through.
Because the sun is up.
Because the sun is behind the tree and the shadow is in front of it.
The tree has a shadow because there is a sun.
The tree has a shadow because it is an object that block a light.
The tree shown in the picture has a shadow because tree blocked the light of the sun.
It has a shadow because the tree is blocking the light from getting away.
The tree is an object blocking the sun so it has a shadow.
The tree has a shadow because it is blocking the sun's light.
